description: An XML-based, international standard format for a spreadsheet that is editable.  Usual file extension is .ods.   Documented with formats for other content categories in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) 1.2.  Standard developed by OASIS and also approved as ISO/IEC 26300:2015.  Supersedes ODS 1.1.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">other</field><field name="filenameExtension">ods, ots</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: OpenDocument Spreadsheet Document Format (ODS), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300:2015.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
